answers.answer: Many causes including uveitis, ocular ischemic syndrome (get carotid doppler exam), centraor branch retinal vein occlusion, lens particle glaucoma, or other types of glaucoma.  Make sure a dilated exam is performed by an EyeMD Ophthalmologist.  This can be a very serious situation.MJK MD

question: What could be the possible causes for high pressure in the left eye and inflamatin of the eye of a person with mild type 2 diabetes
title: High eye and inflamation of the left eye
